2.title: Bigger's Better 2 Paphos
2.plot: Bigger's Better Boxing makes its return to Cyprus bringing the second episode of an eight-man one-night heavyweight tournament live on Eurosport.

3.title: Bigger's Better 3 Paphos
3.plot: Bigger's Better Boxing presents the third episode of a one-night eight-man heavyweight boxing tournament live on Eurosport from Cyprus.

4.title: Bigger's Better 4 Sofia
4.plot: Bigger's Better Boxing comes to Bulgaria with series 4 held in Sofia live on Eurosport.

5.title: Bigger's Better 5 Aarhus
5.plot: Bigger's Better Boxing makes its debut in Denmark bringing the fifth episode of the one-night eight-man heavyweight tournament held at NRGi Arena Aarhus live on Eurosport.

6.title: Bigger's Better 6 Lisbon
6.plot: Bigger's Better Boxing makes its debut in Portugal, bringing an eight-man knockout heavyweight tournament to the famous football stadium S.L. Benfica.

7.title: Bigger's Better 7 Vilnius
7.plot: Bigger's Better brings a knockout heavyweight tournament to Lithuania. One of the greatest boxing referees in the world, Steve Smoger out of the US officiates the event.

8.title: Bigger's Better 8 Lisbon
8.plot: Bigger's Better Boxing returns to Portugal, bringing an eight-man knockout heavyweight tournament to the famous football stadium S.L. Benfica.

9.title: Bigger's Better King 2011
9.plot: Bigger's Better King 2011 - Super Finale of Season 1 airs live on Eurosport from Varazdin Arena in Croatia.

imdb.plot outline: Bigger's Better series includes 9 tournaments per season and features a never-before-seen format in boxing. In the course of an evening each tournament features eight international athletes from different fighting disciplines. They compete in a unique three-round match tournament, battling it out in a simple knock-out format: quarter-finals, semi-finals, final. The actual fights are particularly intense and spectacular. The boxers look for that crucial KO to take them through to the next round without sapping their energy. There are no weight categories. As a results, the fighters from the minimum weight of 82 kg and 130 kg could be pitted against each other. The eventual winner of each tournament goes through to the season climax: Bigger's Better King.
imdb.title: Bigger's Better Boxing
plot: Bigger's Better is a one-night eight-man heavyweight boxing tournament live on Eurosport. It induces a sense of immediate satisfaction, for both the spectator and the fighter. A video game-like experience with real riors. Winner takes all.

Bigger's Better series includes 9 tournaments per season and features a never-before-seen format in boxing. In the course of an evening each tournament features eight international athletes from different fighting disciplines. They compete in a unique three-round match tournament, battling it out in a simple knock-out format: quarter-finals, semi-finals, final. The actual fights are particularly intense and spectacular. The boxers look for that crucial KO to take them through to the next round without sapping their energy. There are no weight categories. As a results, the fighters from the minimum weight of 82 kg and 130 kg could be pitted against each other. The eventual winner of each tournament goes through to the season climax: Bigger's Better King.
